CreateCliToken.name: CreateCliToken
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
CreateCliToken.description:
Grants permission to create a short-lived token that allows a user to invoke Airflow
                                                CLI via an endpoint on the Apache Airflow Webserver

CreateEnvironment.name: CreateEnvironment
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
CreateEnvironment.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon MWAA environment

CreateWebLoginToken.name: CreateWebLoginToken
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
CreateWebLoginToken.description:
Grants permission to create a short-lived token that allows a user to log into Apache
                                                Airflow web UI

DeleteEnvironment.name: DeleteEnvironment
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
DeleteEnvironment.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon MWAA environment

GetEnvironment.name: GetEnvironment
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
GetEnvironment.description: Grants permission to view details about an Amazon MWAA environment

ListEnvironments.name: ListEnvironments
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
ListEnvironments.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon MWAA environments in your account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to lists tag for an Amazon MWAA environment

PublishMetrics.name: PublishMetrics
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
PublishMetrics.description: Grants permission to publish metrics for an Amazon MWAA environment

TagResource.name: TagResource
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon MWAA environment

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag an Amazon MWAA environment

UpdateEnvironment.name: UpdateEnvironment
topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
UpdateEnvironment.description: Grants permission to modify an Amazon MWAA environment

topics: Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow
